metadata.title: CVE-2023-46927 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC 2.3-DEV-rev605-gfc9e29089-master contains a heap-buffer-overflow ingf_isom_use_compact_size gpac/src/isomedia/isom_write.c:3403:3 ingpac/MP4Box.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
